titleStmt.title: Examples for London or a paralell betweene the evill affected malignants of this city, and the seditious Jewes in Jerusalem Also declaring the miserable estate of this city, if this warre should continue, there being so many potent enemies within the confines of the said citie, which seeke to destroy the same.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
